name: Transparency and Explainability
description: Degree to which the system's decision-making process is transparent and explainable.

values.name: Fully Transparent
values.description: System's decision-making process is fully transparent and formally explainable, with clear causal relationships established.

values.name: Highly Explainable
values.description: Highly explainable, system uses inherently interpretable models or provides reliable and comprehensive explanations for all decisions.

values.name: Limited Explainability
values.description: Limited explainability, some post-hoc explanations can be generated, but they may not be reliable or comprehensive.

values.name: Black Box
values.description: Black-box system, no insight into decision-making process.
